text:

monitor and spirometer) in place in case of an anaphylactic reaction (regional hospital level)
Notify the partner to come for examination, syphilis and HIV testing, and treatment within one month. 
Genital warts 
• Caused by Human Papilloma Virus (HPV)
• Common sites: vulva, perineum, vagina and cervix
• Treatment
o Cervical cytology smear if not done in the past year
o Podophyllin contraindicated in pregnancy
o No treatment for small lesions (<
